mapper.insert:
replace into after_sale_return_order (platform_order_sn, platform_order_goods_sn, after_sale_reason, shipping_name, tracking_number, shop_name, outer_id, goods_name, sku_name, platform_goods_id, platform_goods_name, style_value, goods_sub_type, after_sales_type, after_sales_status, warehouse_id, warehouse_name, goods_number, quantity, refund_created_time, return_order_created_time, refund_id,order_sn,order_goods_id,refund_updated_time) VALUES
(#{order.platformOrderSn}, #{order.platformOrderGoodsSn}, #{order.afterSaleReason}, #{order.shippingName}, #{order.trackingNumber}, #{order.shopName}, #{order.outerId}, #{order.goodsName}, #{order.skuName}, #{order.platformGoodsId}, #{order.platformGoodsName}, #{order.styleValue}, #{order.goodsSubType}, #{order.afterSalesType}, #{order.afterSalesStatus}, #{order.warehouseId}, #{order.warehouseName}, #{order.goodsNumber}, #{order.quantity}, #{order.refundCreatedTime}, #{order.returnOrderCreatedTime}, #{order.refundId},#{order.orderSn},#{order.orderGoodsId},#{order.refundUpdatedTime})
